name: Redemption Finance
description: Redemption Finance is a revolutionary yield farming protocol designed to offer you a second chance in the decentralized finance (DeFi) world. Missed the Bitcoin or Ethereum boom? Redemption Finance is your sanctuary for unparalleled earning opportunities. With unique features like "Clean Slate," "Interventions," and "Second Chances," we are redefining what it means to farm in DeFi. Unique Features: - Clean Slate: A weekly event resetting non-main pools, elevating APRs, and sustaining the protocol. - Interventions: Triggered by TVL milestones, offering benefits like extending farming periods and token buybacks. - Second Chances: Additional pools where Redemption (RDMP) tokens can earn various other tokens, enhancing utility. Tokenomics: - Initial Mint: 488 RDMP - Maximum Supply: 71,240,360 RDMP But that's not all; in a first-of-its-kind initiative, we offer real-world asset rewards based on TVL targets, including a Rolex Daytona 116500LN and golf trips. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned farmer, Redemption Finance provides comprehensive resources, a supportive community, and a transparent platform to maximize your earnings. This is your redemption; this is your second chance. Seize it now.
